issue.title: li.blogtrottr.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://li.blogtrottr.com/click?s=124178&%3Bsz=116x15&%3Bli=99999&%3Bm=a47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee&%3Bp=d3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6&%3Blctg=1167671](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fli.blogtrottr.com%2Fclick%3Fs%3D124178%26amp%253Bsz%3D116x15%26amp%253Bli%3D99999%26amp%253Bm%3Da47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee%26amp%253Bp%3Dd3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6%26amp%253Blctg%3D1167671) ### Comment > Здравствуйте! > Прошу добавить правило: > > `||li.blogtrottr.com^` > > Потому как данная ссылка не ведет никуда кроме рекламных переходов. То есть клик на место обведенное на этом https://postimg.cc/4HvjmhVj скриншоте ведет на вышеупомянутую рекламную ссылку. По сути это рекламный домен. > > Пруфы: https://iplogger.org/ru/url-checker/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fli.blogtrottr.com%2Fclick%3Fs%3D124178%26amp%3Bsz%3D116x15%26amp%3Bli%3D99999%26amp%3Bm%3Da47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee%26amp%3Bp%3Dd3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6%26amp%3Blctg%3D1167671 > > Данная ссылка добавляется в сообщения от Blogtrottr в качестве монетизации. > > HTML образец письма: > https://file.io/CYRWbtt12lAQ > Если не будет работать > https://ufile.io/coa69z75 > > P.S: Так же в письме есть ссылки на подобии https://blogtrottr.com/legal/?lctg=1167671, поэтому было бы не лишним так же добавить правило `$removeparam=lctg` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/bvb0l9cv23ccs4c4wo48w0cggk40w00s6h0zumbftw.jpg?nc=1)

Missing objects.

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

OK, great! Fix indeed works on my side too. 👍

#### 🍪 Another problem (cookies-related):

Can you confirm that on [this non geo-locked video](https://www.6play.fr/le-10-minutes-p_11541/29102021-le-10-minutes-c_12901661) for example (coming from [this show](https://www.6play.fr/le-10-minutes-p_11541)), you stay perpetually on [this](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/5b6eae3a-36eb-46a4-b151-5899f7655293) whereas by disabling AdGuard you have [that](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/ae19f353-85da-4977-9b4b-ae4612c3ef2c) and that after choosing cookies (refusal for example), you have the video which [plays correctly](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/92360042-ea56-45c5-89c6-04c7cf729f3d)?
